Title: The health facilities of New China
Designer: Chinese National Science Popularization Association (中华全国科学技术普及协会)
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社)
Notes: A five-poster series from 1952.The photographs show a maternity hospital in Changchun; a pregnant woman being examined; a day nursery in a factory; a day nursery in the countryside; a newborn baby; peasant women; a health worker explaining new techniques to old midwives.
